title.narrative: Application of Industry-Urban Symbiosis and Green Chemistry to reduce releases of POPs and hazardous chemicals as well as GHG emissions, to support inclusive and sustainable growth

description.narrative: ..Applications of Industry-Urban Symbiosis and Green Chemistry to reduce releases of POPs and hazardous chemicals as well as GHG emissions, to support inclusive and sustainable growth Objective: To reduce greenhouse gas emissions, as well as releases of POPs, Mercury and other harmful chemicals from industries and towns through the application of urban-industrial symbiosis and green chemistry technology. .
